caption:
🗣️🇮🇹 Francesco Totti: “If Lionel Messi had been at Roma for 25 years, do you know how many Ballon d’Or awards he would have won? 0. How could I have won one?”

🗣️ Antonio Cassano: “It’s your fault, you’re an idiot, you should have gone to Madrid and you would have won some titles. (laughs)” 🤣

🗣️ Francesco Totti: “I don’t care about winning, I won at Roma. I stayed for 25 years, this is my greatest victory.”

Totti’s stats for Roma:
🏟️ 785 Games
🚀 307 Goals
🎯 205 Assists 
🏆 5 Trophies 
🥇 5x Footballer of the year
🙌 1 Club Man
